Passenger

Interface IPassengerDepartureTerminalEntrance

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDepartureTerminalEntrance
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MDepartureTerminalEntrance

    public interface IPassengerDepartureTerminalEntrance
    Interface for communications between a Passenger and the Departure Terminal Entrance
    Author:
    Filipe Teixeira , Miguel Azevedo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VectorClock prepareNextLeg(VectorClock vecClock)
      The passenger blocks waits for all the passengers to call this method.
